===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[age]] {{gloss|of a person, plant, heavenly body, etc.}}
#: {{zh-x|年齡 分佈|'''age''' distribution}}
#: {{zh-x|法定 年齡|legal '''age'''}}
#: {{zh-x|年齡 階段|stage of (a person's) life}}

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|年齡|tr=niánlíng}} and {{zh-l|年紀}} are different in that the former can refer to the age of a person, plant or heavenly body, while the latter can only refer to the age of a person.

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|年紀}}
* {{zh-l|年歲}}
* {{zh-l|歲數}}
